mapper.sql: t.id, t.hospital_id, t.dept_id, t.doctor_code, t.week, t.plan, t.order_num, t.duty_dtime, t.last_update_dtime
mapper.delete: delete from hospital_doctor_duty where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into hospital_doctor_duty ( hospital_id, dept_id, doctor_code, week, plan, order_num, duty_dtime, last_update_dtime ) values( #{hospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{week,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dutyDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
